thread.title: String theory in under six minutes

post.author: wal
post.body:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IwspgqXoFZc

It's the prequel to tear drop The music's good too. Especially if you happen to be a po-ead. If you are then smoke a fatty coz this is a good one! After it's finished, it will seem like it's been on for a couple of hours.

Strands of energy vibrating in such a complex pattern, that they make things capable of understanding themselves well enough to create a code that can be sent as electro-magnetic waves to decoder boxes that create visual and audio electro-magnetic waves to be measured by four of the aerials attached to our heads and translated by our decoder boxes so that strings can illustrate through a music video to other complex patterns of strings what they are. Beautiful.

post.author: CrimsonHead
post.body: I thought it was pretty cool.
